舝字的基本解释

舝
xiá
同“辖”，穿在车轴两端孔内使车轮不脱落的键。

舝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《廣韻》胡瞎切，入鎋，匣。］
(1)车辖。古代为固定车轮而插在车轴两端的键。
(2)星名。

舝字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舛字部】　舝； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1008第15
【唐韻】胡瞎切【集韻】【韻會】下瞎切【正韻】胡八切，?音轄。【說文】車軸耑鍵也。兩穿相背。【詩·衞風】載脂載舝。【釋文】車軸頭金也。又【小雅】閒關車之舝兮。　又星名。【史記·天官書】鈐北一星曰舝。　又【韻會】亦作轄。【左傳·昭二十五年】叔孫昭子賦車轄。

舝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
舝字的起名意思

暂无。

Jurisdiction
Basic explanation of words
Jurisdiction
xiá
Same as "Jurisdiction", a key worn in the holes at both ends of the axle to prevent the wheel from falling off.
Jurisdiction
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Guangyun" Hu blindly cut, enter the horse, box. ]
(1) Vehicle jurisdiction. Keys inserted at both ends of the axle to fix the wheels in ancient times.
(2) Star name.
Jurisdiction
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Ji Zi Department] 　 Administer; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1008 No. 15
[Tang Yun] Hu blind cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Xia blind cut [Zheng Yun] Hu eight cut,? Yin administrated. [Said the text] The axle is also the key. The two wear opposite each other. [Poetry·Weifeng] contains fat and jurisdiction. [Explanation] The axle head is also gold. And [Xiaoya] I am under the control of the car.　Also star name. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】Qianbei Yixing said jurisdiction.　[Rhyme Club] is also a jurisdiction. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-five Years of Zhao] Uncle Sun Zhaozi gave the jurisdiction to the car.
